title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.18 - Floodlights; patrol system
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.18 - Floodlights; patrol system

State Regulations

Racing associations shall install at their tracks and
maintain floodlights to provide adequate illumination of the stable areas at
night and such patrol system as may be approved by the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4003.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
